pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:6.1: Tena samayena buddho bhagavā bhaggesu viharati susumāragire bhesakaḷāvane migadāye.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:6.2: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhū kokanade pāsāde sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggaṇhanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:6.4: “kathañhi nāma samaṇā sakyaputtiyā sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahessanti, seyyathāpi gihī kāmabhogino”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:7.1: Assosuṃ kho bhikkhū tesaṃ manussānaṃ ujjhāyantānaṃ khiyyantānaṃ vipācentānaṃ.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:7.2: Ye te bhikkhū appicchā … pe … te ujjhāyanti khiyyanti vipācenti—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:7.4: “kathañhi nāma bhikkhū sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahessantī”ti … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:7.5: “saccaṃ kira, bhikkhave, bhikkhū sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggaṇhantī”ti?
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:7.8: kathañhi nāma te, bhikkhave, moghapurisā sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahessanti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:7.9: Netaṃ, bhikkhave, appasannānaṃ vā pasādāya … pe …
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:7.10: evañca pana, bhikkhave, imaṃ sikkhāpadaṃ uddiseyyātha—
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:8.1: “Na sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggahessāmīti sikkhā karaṇīyā”ti.
pli-tv-bu-vb-sk55:9.2: Yo anādariyaṃ paṭicca sāmisena hatthena pānīyathālakaṃ paṭiggaṇhāti, āpatti dukkaṭassa.
